branchCategory.name: NCM
branchCategory.description: SMC's series NCM-X6009 utilizes the same quality features and is dimensionally interchangeable with the NCM standard series.  NCM-X6009's external components are all 303/304 stainless steel.  The series is available in 6 bore sizes and with auto switch capability.  Options include food grade grease, viton wiper, viton seals and a urethane cushion.  High and low temperature options are also available on models without auto switch magnet and/or the urethane cushion.

branchItem.name: NC(D)M, All Stainless Steel Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, X6009
branchItem.description: All stainless steel exterior double acting single rod version of our NCM cylinders. A wear ring extends the seal life and a bronze rod bushing is standard on all bore sizes. The NCM is available in 2 mounting styles (front nose &amp; double end). The double end mount does automatically include a rear clevis hole. The NCM is auto-switch capable without any change in cylinder dimension. Bore sizes range from 3/4" to 2" and standard strokes from 1/2" to 12".
